review_text: I take melatonin sporadically when I need an extra boost for a deep night’s sleep, and I have to say, it’s a fantastic high-quality product! It tastes amazing, too!
I like this brand, good quality. The liposomal form is better absorbed by the body. Well-chosen ingredients for quality sleep and falling asleep quickly.
This is the best supplement for sleep I have tried. Notices good effect and sleeps through the night
